name: Aiga
description:
A small prototype made for "MetroDivaniaMonthJam".

Play as a goat and destroy enemies with your horns.

Controls:

Space=jump

Left-Right=Left-Right Arrow

F=Attack

Most of the assets are made in midjourney.

Other assets used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-remaster-free-109...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/brick/stone-and-ice-...

https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/sounds/188182/

https://freesound.org/people/mateozugi19/sounds/446827/
